name: Data Management Engineer (HarmanX)
description:
A Career at HARMAN

As a technology leader that is rapidly on the move, HARMAN is filled with people who are focused on making life better. Innovation, inclusivity and teamwork are a part of our DNA. When you add that to the challenges we take on and solve together, you’ll discover that at HARMAN you can grow, make a difference and be proud of the work you do every day.

About the Role

We’re looking for an advanced data manager who would take a responsibility to arrange data management (gathering, transferring, storing, efficient use) processes for the project aiming gathering petabyte-level data lake at a variety of locations.

Your Team

You’ll take a part in an advanced research project on the edge of AI, Big Data, informational technologies and brain science.

What You Will Do

  • Arranging data gathering processes across several geographically distributed sites.
  • Analyzing bottlenecks in data gathering, transferring and processing.
  • Ensuring the infrastructure is sufficient and efficient for gathering, storing and processing data.
  • Getting to know very specifics of the ways the company collects the data.
  • Figuring out the ways for keeping the data safe.

What You Need

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent.
  • 8+ years in data management or cloud administration.
  • Advanced practical knowledge of Linux.
  • Understanding of network technologies.
  • Deep experience of both on-premises and cloud data management practices.
  • Ability to define processes other people to follow and manage people in data-related aspects.
  • Sense of scientific research. Participation in research projects is a big plus.
  • Speaking English is a must.

What Makes You Eligible

  • Be willing to travel internationally
  • Be willing to work in our R&D center in Nizhny Novgorod

What We Offer

Work in our international team on brand new projects and using cutting edge technologies. Our employees get soft skills’ and technical trainings. We grant a package of additional benefits, such as flexible working time, medical insurance, English classes, HARMAN and Samsung products’ discount program, sport and event programs. We also grant Relocation package for candidates from other cities, composed of monetary bonuses and organizational assistance.
